<p style="margin-bottom: 30px;"> Throughout my academic journey, I have undertaken and participated in numerous projects, some of which are showcased on this page. The first project entails a comprehensive document summarizing my proficiency in statistics, data visualization, and programming using R. The second project is a poster created to conclude my first-year master's internship. The final project, a collaborative effort between my two colleagues and me during the second year of our master's program, is a Shiny dashboard describing the genomic and historical aspects of the second *Yersinia pestis* pandemic in Europe.</p>
